name: Betting Payback Calculator
author: https://www.oddsvalue.com

sections.description:
Let your users easily calculate the the theoretical payback percentage of any group of odds

Features

  • Seamless javascript integration with instant calculation
  • Calculate for 2 to 10 odds
  • Multi lingual

Display Payback Calculator

  • Use [betting_payback_calculator] shortcode where you want to display the calculator.
  • You can change fonts and colors in the Settings >> Betting Payback admin menu

Supported languages

  • English
  • Danish
  • Macedonian
  • Serbian
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “Betting Payback Calculator” to the folder: /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the “Betting Payback Calculator” through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin from Settings > Betting Payback in your admin menu
  4. Use [betting_payback_calculator] shortcode where you want to display the plugin
sections.faq:
How can I display the Betting Payback Calculator plugin

Use [betting_payback_calculator] shortcode wherever you want.

Is it free?

Yes, it is free.

Is the plugin responsive?

Yes
